pageContext.claim: “So when the MS-13 comes in, when the other gang members come into our country, I refer to them as animals. And guess what? I always will. But we're getting them out by the thousands.”
pageContext.analysis: Figures from ICE show a clear surge in law enforcement activity targeting MS-13 since Trump took office, but they don't show that “thousands” of the gang’s members have been deported on Trump’s watch. Rather, they show something in the “hundreds” ballpark.
